entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -30.6°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -36.0°C
Wind: W 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
